@Sick_psyc:
Have you even read that document? It says to use rar, to store as rar, to not repack and to unrar it every time you want to watch something ? that's laughable ? but it doesn't say why! I know it's a workaround for a weakness in DirectConnect but this is BitTorrent! Still it's much less bullshit than hardsubbing which in most cases utterly destroys the movies for me ? so thank you for not doing that.
